metadata.title: CVE-2018-11218 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Memory Corruption was discovered in the cmsgpack library in the Luasubsystem in Redis before 3.2.12, 4.x before 4.0.10, and 5.x before 5.0 RC2because of stack-based buffer overflows.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis-sentinel - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
redis-server - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
redis-tools - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2').
